modName: Light Dawnguard Vampire Armor CBBE_UUNP HDT
summary: A conversion of dawnguard armor CBBE to HDT with short.
descriptionHtml:
A simple conversion of dawnguard armor CBBE to HDT with short.
It comes with BodySlide and Outfit Studio files if you want ajust the breasts or whatever.

It's based on CBBEv3 mod by Echo 1162 with Retexture of M[size=2]essiasmummo.

Just drop the files on data folder for armor.
If you want change the preset, drop the BodySlide folder on your BodySlide directory.
[i](You need [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015][i]BodySlide and Outfit Studio by Caliente[/i][/url][i]).[/i]

1.0 initial release
1.1 non hdt version as request
1.2 uunp hdt version for fun because i play with uunp body this time :)

[/size][size=2]Credits
Dawnguard Vampire Armors Retexture :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28014/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28014/?[/url] by messiasmummo
　
Dawnguard Vampire Armors CBBEv3 Echo :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22239/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22239/?[/url] by Echo 1162
　
[/size]Caliente and [size=2]ousnius [/size]for BodySlide and Bethesda.
author: Adeline
